meanings.definition: To give a particular texture or pattern to something.
meanings.sent1: She texturises the clay by adding small dots with a toothpick.
meanings.sent2: The artist texturises the canvas with bold brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: The chef texturises the cake with intricate icing designs.
meanings.sent4: The gardener texturises the garden with a variety of plants and flowers.
meanings.sent5: The tailor texturises the fabric by using different weaving techniques.

meanings.definition: To make something more interesting or varied by adding different elements.
meanings.sent1: He texturises his stories with unexpected plot twists.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer texturises the room with colorful accents.
meanings.sent3: The musician texturises the song with unique instrument choices.
meanings.sent4: The chef texturises the dish with a fusion of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher texturises the lesson with interactive activities.
